## Conversion.Converter.withTypeGuard() method

Creates a [Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md) which applies a supplied type guard to the conversion result.

**Signature:**

```typescript
withTypeGuard<TI>(guard: (from: unknown, context?: TC) => from is TI, message?: string): Converter<TI, TC>;
```

</th><th>

Type

Description

guard


</td><td>

(from: unknown, context?: TC) =&gt; from is TI


</td><td>

The type guard function to apply.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

message


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional message to be reported if the type guard fails.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md)<!-- -->&lt;TI, TC&gt;

A new [Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md) returning `<TI>`<!-- -->.
